An AI Employee That Actually Works

PiAgent is a pre-configured AI employee that lives on your desk. It sends emails, manages your calendar, writes code, researches competitors — and never sends your data to the cloud.

Cloud AI Is Eating Your Data

Every document you upload to ChatGPT, every email you draft in Claude, every proprietary insight you share — it becomes training data. Your competitive advantage? Now it's OpenAI's.

  • ✕
    Client contracts analyzed by third-party servers
  • ✕
    Proprietary code sent to cloud LLMs
  • ✕
    Patient data exposed for HIPAA violations
  • ✕
    $20-200/month per user in subscription fees
The Cloud AI Risk
Data Retention30-90 days minimum
Training UsageOpt-out buried in settings
ComplianceSOC2, not your control
Monthly Cost (10 users)$200-2,000+

AgentMail Integration

Your Agent Has Its Own Email Address

Every PiAgent includes AgentMail — a dedicated email inbox designed for AI agents. Your agent can send, receive, and respond to emails just like a human team member.

  • Professional @agentmail.to address
  • Two-way conversation handling
  • Thread-aware responses with context
  • Human-in-the-loop approval for sends
  • Custom domain support (Pro+)
Example:
sarah.agent@agentmail.to
Inbox (3 new)sarah.agent@agentmail.to
john@client.com2m ago
Re: Proposal Feedback
marketing@company.com15m ago
Campaign Stats
no-reply@github.com1h ago
PR #234 Merged
Agent drafted 2 responses awaiting approval
Enterprise-Grade Security

Built Like a Vault, Not a Cloud App

We didn't bolt on security — we built the entire architecture around it. Defense in depth, zero trust, and complete transparency.

Docker Containerization

Each agent runs in isolated Docker containers with restricted permissions. Compromised? It stays contained. No system-wide access, no escape routes.

Air-Gap Capable

Physically disconnect from the internet and your agent keeps working. No cloud dependencies, no telemetry, no data leakage. Military-grade isolation.

Zero-Trust Architecture

Every action verified. Least-privilege principles. No default passwords. Encrypted storage at rest. Your agent can't be turned against you.

Complete Audit Trail

Every command, every file access, every email logged locally. Full transparency into what your agent does. No black boxes.

Full Disk Encryption

LUKS encryption standard. Your data is unreadable without the key. Physical theft? They get hardware, not your information.

No Cloud, No Leaks

Unlike ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini — your documents never train public models. Proprietary data stays proprietary. Period.

Security Feature
Cloud AI (ChatGPT/Claude)
PiAgent
Data Leaves Your Premises
Yes — to their servers
Never — stays on device
Training Data Usage
Opt-out only
Impossible — no cloud connection
Physical Control
None — you rent access
Full — you own the hardware
Air-Gap Capability
No — requires internet
Yes — works fully offline
Audit Logs
Theirs — limited visibility
Yours — complete transparency

We Ship

Heartbeat System

Proactive, Not Reactive

Most AI waits for commands. Your PiAgent has a heartbeat — it wakes up on a schedule, checks its responsibilities, and alerts you when something needs attention.

  • Checks email for urgent messages every 30 min
  • Preps meeting briefs before your calls
  • Follows up on sent emails automatically
  • Monitors competitors and alerts on changes
HEARTBEAT.md Active
## Morning Check (8 AM)
- [ ] Check calendar for today's meetings
- [ ] Review overnight emails
- [ ] Check GitHub PRs needing review

## Afternoon (2 PM)
- [ ] Follow up on emails sent 24h ago
- [ ] Check competitor pricing alerts

Frequently Asked Questions

Can I really run this without internet?

Yes. PiAgent works completely offline. The LLM runs locally on the Pi 5. You only need internet for initial setup (optional) and if you want email functionality.

What happens if someone steals the device?

Full disk encryption (LUKS) protects your data. Without the decryption key, the hardware is useless to thieves.

How is this different from running OpenClaw myself?

We do the hard work: hardware assembly, security hardening, Docker configuration, skill installation, and testing. You get a plug-and-play solution instead of a weekend project.

Can I add my own skills?

Absolutely. PiAgent is built on OpenClaw, so you can install community skills or build your own. Enterprise plans include custom skill development.

What LLM does it use?

We ship with optimized local models (Llama 3.2, Qwen 2.5) running via Ollama. You can also configure cloud API endpoints if needed.
